review: Absolutely wonderful.  This product works well.  I never have any stutter, it has made my "dumb tv" into a "smart tv."  The apps are great.  I will give you a warning and state that if you have Directv or Comcast, alot of apps do not grant you access to their content.  Other than that, and the current lack of HBO Go, it performs admirably.I have attempted to sideload a few apps and a few Roms to play games from my Nintendo days.  It is really difficult to get the controller to operate properly on the sideloaded roms so I have since deleted them.  Overall I much prefer this fire stick over my Chromecast.  There isnt much to say that hasnt been written already.  It is a solid device with great support from Amazon.
